channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Example Visulaisations
item.description: Here are some examples of the visualisations I made - China - Male vs Female Population - This is a visualisations I made in R using the highcharter library. There is also a play button at the bottom to view the population growth over-time. India - Domestic Violence Quiz - A visualisation to understand the physical abuse that women in India are subjected to. India - Literacy Rate - This is a report I made to visualise corealltions of Literacy Rate in different regions of the country to different variables measuresd in the 15th Indian Census (2011)

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Computer Science graduate from Ashoka Univerity with a keen interest in data analysis and machine learning. This is a simple website I made to showcase some visualisations I created.
